response.job_title: PhD Student at UC Berkeley | Optimization Applied to Energy Systems | Energy Markets & Power Systems Operation
response.summary:
First year PhD student in Operations Research at University of California at Berkeley. Mechatronics engineer with graduate studies in Electrical Engineering. I am interested and have got experience in the natural gas and electric energy sector. 
Because of my graduate studies and my work experience, I know how the Colombian electric system and electrical market operate. These are areas about which I am passionate and on which I intend to continue my future work. Interdisciplinarity, an international education and eagerness to learn new things are among by most important strengths.
response.skills: Analytical Skills, Research, Leadership, Professional Responsibility, Student Discipline

profile_positions.description: Consulting in planning of the expansion of transmission systems. Development of system impact studies for conventional and non-conventional power plants in the North American power grid, including load flow, short circuit and transient stability analyses for solar power plants.
profile_positions.title: Research and Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
Preparation of pre-feasibility studies for electric generation projects (especially small hydro plants), wind energy pilot projects and LNG market start-up.
Company representative to project stakeholders, such as international partners, sector associations, Colombian Energy Regulatory Commission and Energy State Planner, among others.
In charge of commercial and regulatory responsibilities of the subsidiary company for electric energy, Termopiedras. Also in charge of communications with its stakeholders, such as the national system operator and electrical market administrator (XM) and the local grid operator.
In charge of reporting daily data of power plant energy meters to XM, the market operator.
profile_positions.title: Director Project Management

profile_positions.description:
Design and installation of instrumentation and control systems in a natural gas treatment and electric generation plant (setup of automatic backup generator, backup variable frequency drive, mounting of 1,8MW generator set, among others).
Setting and supervision of protection relays for generators and connection line.
Development of supervision and control software (SCADA, Energy Measures Management Centre, for reporting to XM, the electrical market administrator).
In charge of power plant compliance with new Measure Regulation (CREG038-2014).
Programming of Schneider ION energy meters for setting up remote measuring system.
profile_positions.title: Control Engineer

profile_positions.description: Development of the Bachelor thesis “Development and implementation of the control and measurement system for a Coriolis flowmeter".
profile_positions.title: Intern

company.name: GERS USA - Consulting Engineers
company.description:
GERS is a group with more than 40 years of experience specializing in Consulting Services in Electrical Engineering and associated areas. The group has incorporated companies in the USA, Colombia, Chile, and Mexico.
 
GERS has been involved in the completion of projects of important sizes and complexity for utilities, oil and gas facilities, and industrial & commercial organizations of more than 46 countries around the world over the past three decades. These long years of experience, international presence and exposure, along with a strongly educated technical workforce, assure our clients reliable service, deliverables, and satisfaction.
